keyMoments.title: Declaration to Surpass Crocodile
keyMoments.description: When asked if he knows who he's fighting, Luffy declares that he doesn't care and that he will surpass Crocodile, showing his fearless determination.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth in confidence and his willingness to challenge anyone who stands in the way of protecting his friends and achieving his dreams.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Storm Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts his devastating Gomu Gomu no Storm technique, combining Gomu Gomu no Fusen with spinning momentum to deliver a barrage of powerful punches.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the debut of one of Luffy's most powerful pre-timeskip finishing moves, demonstrating his creativity in combining Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Warlord Crocodile
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Storm overpowers Crocodile's Desert La Spada, punching the Warlord through solid bedrock and hundreds of feet into the air above Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: First victory over a Warlord of the Sea, proving the Straw Hat Pirates' strength and marking a major milestone in Luffy's journey to becoming Pirate King.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Storm
abilities.description: Luffy inflates his body, twists tightly, then releases the air while untwisting to rocket forward spinning, delivering a constant barrage of powerful punches with massively enhanced momentum.

keyMoments.title: Unleashes Sables Pesado
keyMoments.description: Growing desperate, Crocodile uses Sables Pesado to create a massive shockwave that destroys large portions of the ancient ruins.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Crocodile using increasingly powerful attacks as he realizes Luffy is a genuine threat.

keyMoments.title: Desert La Spada
keyMoments.description: Crocodile counters Luffy's final attack with Desert La Spada, forming solid sand blades - the only time he creates solid objects from sand.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the pinnacle of Crocodile's Devil Fruit mastery, though it ultimately fails against Luffy's determination.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Crocodile is defeated when Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Storm breaks through his Desert La Spada, sending him crashing through bedrock and into the sky above Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Crocodile's elaborate conspiracy to take over Arabasta and his first major defeat. His loss of consciousness ends the drought.

keyMoments.title: Drought Ends with His Defeat
keyMoments.description: When Crocodile loses consciousness, the effect of his Suna Suna no Mi preventing rainfall is neutralized, and rain returns to Arabasta for the first time in three years.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the extent of Crocodile's Devil Fruit influence over the environment and marks the true liberation of Arabasta.

abilities.name: Sables Pesado
abilities.description: A powerful sand-based attack that creates a massive shockwave upon impact, capable of destroying large structures.

abilities.name: Desert La Spada
abilities.description: An altered version of Desert Spada where Crocodile forms several solid blades with fan-shaped edges made from compressed sand. The only time Crocodile creates solid objects from sand.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Stops the Civil War
keyMoments.description: From the bell tower, Vivi's desperate pleas to stop fighting finally reach the citizens as rain begins to fall. Both the royal army and rebels cease their battle.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of Vivi's journey and her ultimate success in saving her kingdom. Her voice and the rain together end the war engineered by Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: People Recognize Their Princess
keyMoments.description: As the fighting stops and rain falls, the people of Arabasta recognize that Princess Vivi has survived and realize the truth about the conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Validates Vivi's sacrifice and her determination to save her people. The recognition restores faith in the royal family.

name: Nefertari Cobra
nameJapanese: ネフェルタリ・コブラ

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Crocodile's Defeat
keyMoments.description: King Cobra watches in shock as Luffy's attack sends Crocodile crashing through the bedrock ceiling of the tomb and into the sky above Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: Cobra witnesses the young pirate who saved his kingdom achieve the impossible - defeating a Warlord of the Sea.
